fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives:
as associações empresariais, empresas e organismos da administração local estão no  radar 
 
business associations, companies and local government bodies are on the radar
relevant_communication:
Implementar, em lingua portuguesa, um orgão de comunicação sobre temas europeus. 
Acompanhar parceiros e clientes no estabelecimento de contactos com as instituições europeias 
 
To implement a media platform, in portuguese, on European themes. 
help partners and clients in establishing contacts with European institutions
goals__remit:
Oferecer um serviço de consultoría em comunicação, adequado aos objetivos das empresas e outros organismos, potenciando o contacto com as entidades europeias, para que se torne mais acessível uma melhor  exposição e conhecimento das temáticas europeias. 
 
to provide a communication consultancy service, adequate to the objectives of companies and other organizations, promoting contact with European entities, so that a better exposure and knowledge of the European themes becomes more accessible
